products.name: TELUS HTC Desire 510 Smartphone - Black - Prepaid
products.shortDescription: The HTC Desire 510 delivers power and performance in a stylish, cost-effective package. Driven by a 1.2GHz quad-core processor on the LTE network, this smartphone showcases rich graphics on a stunning 4.7" LCD display. It can handle multiple apps with ease, provides smooth gaming performance, and keeps you connected on the go with HTC BlinkFeed.

products.name: TELUS iPhone 6 16GB - Space Grey - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: iPhone 6 isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. iPhone 6 features an A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture, 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels, Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor, longer battery life, and iOS 8. Enjoy a stunning 4.7-inch Retina HD display that seamlessly meets the smooth metal surface, all in a 6.9mm thin design.

products.name: TELUS HTC Desire 320 Smartphone - Black- Prepaid
products.shortDescription: Stay connected with the HTC Desire 320 smartphone. Running on Android Kit Kat with a quad-core processor, it delivers fast and smooth performance for everything you're doing on the go - from downloading apps to chatting online. View your social media updates, newsfeeds and other important info in one place with HTC BlinkFeed.

products.name: TELUS iPhone 6 64GB - Space Grey - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: iPhone 6 isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. iPhone 6 features an A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture, 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels, Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor, longer battery life, and iOS 8. Enjoy a stunning 4.7-inch Retina HD display that seamlessly meets the smooth metal surface, all in a 6.9mm thin design.

products.name: TELUS iPhone 6 16GB - Gold - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: iPhone 6 isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. iPhone 6 features an A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture, 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels, Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor, longer battery life, and iOS 8. Enjoy a stunning 4.7-inch Retina HD display that seamlessly meets the smooth metal surface, all in a 6.9mm thin design.

products.name: Rogers Lumia Nokia 635 Smartphone - Black - Prepaid
products.shortDescription: The Nokia Lumia 635 works smarter so you get things done faster. This Windows Phone 8.1 uses the Word Flow keyboard, one of the fastest around, and you can access all of your chats, social updates and settings with just one swipe in the all-new Action Center. Bluetooth and a blazing quick quad-core processor make operation lightning fast.

products.name: TELUS iPhone 6 16GB - Silver - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: iPhone 6 isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. iPhone 6 features an A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture, 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels, Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor, longer battery life, and iOS 8. Enjoy a stunning 4.7-inch Retina HD display that seamlessly meets the smooth metal surface, all in a 6.9mm thin design.

products.name: TELUS Motorola Moto G Smartphone - Black - Prepaid
products.shortDescription: When it comes to performance, the Moto G doesn't just phone it in. The newest smartphone from Motorola and Google, it's equipped with a 4.5" brilliant HD display, advanced Android operating system, quad-core processor, and all day battery, making it the perfect accompaniment for your busy lifestyle.

products.name: TELUS Alcatel Pop Icon Smartphone - Black - Prepaid
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the benefits of a smartphone without breaking the bank with this easy-to-use Android smartphone from Alcatel. The Pop Icon is great for novice yet discerning Android users who are looking for a great camera, large screen and powerful processor in an attractive package. The KitKat OS has a simple interface with Google Voice capabilities.

products.name: TELUS BlackBerry Passport Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: Designed with professionals in mind, the BlackBerry Passport makes working on the go a lot more gratifying. The 4.5" square LCD screen is custom built for BlackBerry users so it's easy to browse the web, manage emails, view documents and organize your calendar. It's equipped with a touch-enabled QWERTY keyboard and smart virtual keys.

products.name: Motorola Moto G LTE Unlocked Smartphone - Black
products.shortDescription: Stay connected and get things done wherever you go with Moto G LTE, offering fast access to apps and smooth video streaming on the LTE network. Enjoy snappy performance whether you're talking on the phone and emailing, or playing a video in the background and texting at the same time.

products.name: InvisibleSHIELD by ZAGG iPhone 6 Glass Screen Protector - Clear
products.shortDescription: This ZAGG InvisibleSHIELD Glass Screen Protector offers you reliable protection to keep your iPhone 6 safe from accidental damage and everyday bumps and scratches. This protector is designed with performance in mind and includes a smooth touch surface doesn't interfere with the navigation and tapered edges that reduce snagging.

products.name: Bell Sony Xperia Z3 16GB Compact Smartphone (Bell Exclusive) - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: With the Sony Xperia Z3 Compact, you'll get a combination of quality and innovation and high-end performance in a beautifully compact design. You'll also experience a revolutionary smartphone experience with PS4 Remote Play, which allows you to directly connect to your favourite PS4 games via WiFi, and great pictures thanks to a 20.7MP camera.

products.name: Bell Sony Xperia Z3 16GB Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: The Sony Xperia Z3 is designed for real life. This fully waterproof cell phone shoots stunning HD photos or 4K video in the rain and from the pool, with 3D surround sound to match brilliant audio with your visuals. When you get home, connect wirelessly to your PS4 to pick up where you left off in the game right from your smartphone.

products.name: Virgin Mobile Samsung Galaxy S4 Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Gold Plan
products.shortDescription: Just when you thought smartphones couldn't get any more amazing, the Samsung Galaxy S4 arrives. Beyond the gorgeous 5-inch display that lets you enjoy Full HD visuals, this ultra-thin genius features Dual Cameras with super-smart functions, Multi Window, and Air View with Smart Gestures. And that's just the beginning.

products.name: Bell Apple iPhone 5s 16GB - Silver - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: Loaded with more features than ever before, the iPhone 5s is designed to impress. It's still super-thin and light, but now comes with a Touch ID fingerprint sensor that will recognize only your touch, as well as A7 and M7 processors for breathtaking performance. And with the 8MP iSight camera, even photos and videos will look more impressive.

products.name: Rogers Samsung Galaxy Note 4 32GB Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: Do more every day, at work and at play, with the Samsung Galaxy Note 4. With Samsung's first ever Quad HD Super AMOLED display, the Note 4 delivers lifelike colour and visuals on the brilliant 5.7" screen. Put away the paper and pick up the S Pen, which perfectly emulates a smooth, instinctive writing experience.

products.name: TELUS iPhone 6 64GB - Gold - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: iPhone 6 isn't just bigger-it's better in every way. iPhone 6 features an A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture, 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels, Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor, longer battery life, and iOS 8. Enjoy a stunning 4.7-inch Retina HD display that seamlessly meets the smooth metal surface, all in a 6.9mm thin design.

products.name: LifeProof fre iPhone 6 Fitted Hard Shell Case - Avalanche
products.shortDescription: LifeProof has delivered an iPhone 6 case as advanced as the Apple technology it houses. The fre for iPhone 6 is a slim, light, waterproof and drop proof case that also features a built-in scratch protector so thin and clear you will barely realize it's there.

products.name: TELUS Alcatel Onetouch A392A Cell Phone - Black - Prepaid
products.shortDescription: Keep it simple.  The Telus Alcatel A392A is low cost but ultra reliable, designed to fulfill all your cell phone needs without all the bells and whistles of a smartphone. This flip phone comes equipped with a 2MP camera for capturing memories, and a 2.4" display for reviewing your shots before sharing them with friends and family over Bluetooth.

products.name: TELUS Samsung Galaxy S5 Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S5 smartphone offers full HD display, HDR capability and a 16MP camera for images that rival your old point-and-shoot. Enjoy sharp clarity when watching videos, or capture natural light and vivid detail while taking photos, even fast-action shots. It also comes with smart functions for tighter security and faster download speeds.

products.name: Telus Samsung Galaxy Note 4 32GB Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: Do more every day, at work and at play, with the Samsung Galaxy Note 4. With Samsung's first ever Quad HD Super AMOLED display, the Note 4 delivers lifelike colour and visuals on the brilliant 5.7" screen. Put away the paper and pick up the S Pen, which perfectly emulates a smooth, instinctive writing experience.

products.name: Bell Samsung Galaxy S5 Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Agreement
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S5 smartphone captures images that can rival your old point-and-shoot and boasts a tough exterior to withstand both rain and dust. Enjoy sharp clarity when watching videos and vivid detail while shooting fast-action shots. With features like a heart rate sensor and 16GB of memory, it's a ready match for your active lifestyle.

products.name: Virgin Mobile Samsung Galaxy Core LTE Smartphone - Black - 2 Year Silver Plan
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy Core LTE gets you surfing the internet and downloading fast. The slim smartphone is loaded with smart features like Easy Mode and Drop Box so you can display what's important on your home screen and access your digital files anytime. Enjoy watching and playing HD content on the 4.5" QHD display.

products.name: Adreama PowerBank 6000mAh Portable Charger - Black
products.shortDescription: Don't get caught with thirsty devices. The Adreama Portable PowerBank keeps your smartphone, tablet, MP3 player and console juiced up with battery power so you're never left without information or entertainment.

products.name: Koodo LG Nexus 5 Smartphone - Black - On a $300 Koodo Tab
products.shortDescription: Slim, light, and incredibly fast, the Nexus 5 helps you capture everyday moments in extraordinary ways. Taking photos and surfing the web has never looked better thanks to the stunning 5" Full HD IPS display. Powered by Android 4.4 KitKat, it also comes equipped with an 8MP camera to shoot beautiful photos in any light.
